title: A lost soul looks for rest. A lost people look for hope, and the Return of the King
description:
Alexander Camlin is not alone in his struggle for sobriety and sanity in our secular age. Why is our culture sometimes so toxic? What is a human being? Do we need a deep, symbolic, mythological world to be immersed within? Even if we have that can we fulfill it? 

Alexander Camlin's Intro Video https://youtu.be/24-OkCB_DfI

https://www.amazon.com/Hobbit-Wardrobe-Great-War-Rediscovered/dp/B01LP2GR08/

and look for input from the YouTube

know appreciative of the the feedback as
many of you know over the last couple of

I tried
any of these different programs and I I

now I decided that I needed to do
